issue.message: This com.google.android.material.chip.ChipGroup should use `android:layout_width="wrap_content"`
This LinearLayout should use `android:layout_height="wrap_content"`
Consider using `apply()` instead; `commit` writes its data to persistent storage immediately, whereas `apply` will handle it in the background
Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `toLowerCase(Locale)` instead. For strings meant to be internal use `Locale.ROOT`, otherwise `Locale.getDefault()`.
Not targeting the latest versions of Android; compatibility modes apply. Consider testing and updating this version. Consult the android.os.Build.VERSION_CODES javadoc for details.

issue.message: On SDK version 23 and up, your app data will be automatically backed up and restored on app install. Consider adding the attribute `android:fullBackupContent` to specify an `@xml` resource which configures which files to backup. More info: https://developer.android.com/training/backup/autosyncapi.html
This tag and its children can be replaced by one `<TextView/>` and a compound drawable
Very long vector path (2101 characters), which is bad for performance. Considering reducing precision, removing minor details or rasterizing vector.
Very long vector path (902 characters), which is bad for performance. Considering reducing precision, removing minor details or rasterizing vector.
